songs.title: Not Of This World
songs.firstLine: Looking for god - looking for life.

songs.title: The Lost Children
songs.firstLine: We started out life so innocent but got lost somewhere on the way.
songs.lastLine: So where are all the lost children? They're coming home to stay this time.

songs.title: Paintbox
songs.firstLine: Painting pictures of a thousand different paths.
songs.lastLine: I paint the path I want to take and paint a life of fire.
